last_modified_task: Implemented the ELTVRE (Extract, Load, Transform, Validate, Refine, Enrich) pipeline for GS1 standards documents.

changes.description: Clarified `project_journal.md` as a preferred logging location in global instructions.
Created isa/reports/status_dashboard.md and isa/core/isa_summarizer.py as part of logging and testing verification.
Removed artificial delay in mode switching to improve responsiveness.
Revised Roocode Mode Architecture, updated mode definitions, model assignments, and thinking budgets in `isa/config/roo_mode_map.json`.
Implemented Roocode Mode Architecture v2.1 improvements, including LLM re-assignments, new modes, advanced prompt engineering, failure simulation plans, and versioning strategies.
Fixed spelling error 'juni' to 'June' in Git commit message file.
Defined the Knowledge Graph schema in `isa/schemas/knowledge_graph_schema.md`.
Selected Knowledge Graph technology and documented it in `isa/architecture/knowledge_graph_technology_selection.md`.
Implemented the initial Knowledge Graph (KG) ingestion process using Neo4j, including `isa/indexing/kg_ingestor.py`.

Implemented the ELTVRE (Extract, Load, Transform, Validate, Refine, Enrich) pipeline for GS1 standards documents, including the creation of `isa/eltvre/` directory and its modular Python components (`extractor.py`, `loader.py`, `transformer.py`, `validator.py`, `refiner.py`, `enricher.py`, `__init__.py`).
Enhanced `src/ai/flows/answer-gs1-questions.ts` with Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning, adding steps for thought process generation, initial answer, and refined answer.
Refined and expanded agentic workflows by creating `isa/agentic_workflows/` and implementing `langchain_integration.py` with a multi-agent workflow.
